title: Telepresence Classroom Design for Establishing Presence in Distance Education

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary digital literacy and comprehension of social studies curriculum
context.additional_context: A course strengthening social sector job competencies through PBL in smartphone-dominant limited-technology environments.

learning_goals: Learners implement virtual presence at over 80% proficiency by employing social interaction strategies in telepresence classrooms.
Learners maintain active participation in project collaboration processes by utilizing three or more digital tools.
Learners can diagnose their level of presence and develop improvement plans through formative assessments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
